item.title: Go Dep with private Bitbucket repositories using SSH keys
item.description: You’re probably here because you’ve worked hard to modularise your Go codebase and break it into some great libraries you can use again and again. You’re acing it and everything was going swimmingly until you ran dep ensure with a new import of your library, which is hosted privately on Bitbucket. Everything fell apart. It gave an error, or more likely, hung indefinitely in total silence. Why do I have this problem?
